availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George D. Rucker (Franklin County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, Physician. Shelby County, Kentucky, native. Married to Anna Ware Rucker. Father of Leonidas Rucker and Anne Eliza Rucker Vannella. Married Emily Blanta Rucker in Shelby County, Kentucky, in June 1843. Father of Susan Rucker, Lesimicus Rucker, Mahaley Rucker, Plato Rucker, Edward D. Rucker, and Mary Rucker. Physician in Franklin County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Franklin County in 1860.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Shelby County Marriages, Film #000259274, p. 1217.
